alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:41AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb, south central Fulton and northwestern Clayton Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 941 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over College Park, or 7 miles east of City of South Fulton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, City of South Fulton, East Point, Union City, Forest Park, College Park, Fairburn, Hapeville, Avondale Estates, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, Sweet Auburn and Piedmont Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; DeKalb; North Fulton; South Fulton
